# loadImage(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Loads the localized image that you associate with the leaderboard set.

## Declaration

```swift
func loadImage(completionHandler: ((UIImage?, (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func loadImage(completionHandler: ((NSImage?, (any Error)?) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func loadImage() async throws -> NSImage
```

```swift
func loadImage() async throws -> UIImage
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A block that GameKit calls when this method completes the request.

The block receives the following parameters:



## Loading Leaderboard Sets

- **loadLeaderboardSets(completionHandler:)**: Loads all of the leaderboard sets you configure for your game.
- **loadLeaderboards(handler:)**: Loads the leaderboards in the leaderboard set.
- **loadLeaderboards(completionHandler:)**: Loads all of the leaderboards for the current leaderboard set.
